movie.title: Cat on a Hot Tin Roof
movie.title_english: Cat on a Hot Tin Roof
movie.title_long: Cat on a Hot Tin Roof (1958)
movie.description_intro: The family of "Big Daddy" Pollitt (Burl Ives) convenes at his and Big Momma's (Dame Judith Anderson's). Among the attendees is alcoholic son, Brick (Paul Newman); an ex-football player, who spends his time drinking and avoiding the ministries of his libidinous wife, Maggie (Dame Elizabeth Taylor) - "the cat". As this gathering isn't so much as a gathering but a farewell (Big Daddy is terminally ill) a lot of memories and revelations which had been hidden come to the surface of both father and son.
movie.description_full: The family of "Big Daddy" Pollitt (Burl Ives) convenes at his and Big Momma's (Dame Judith Anderson's). Among the attendees is alcoholic son, Brick (Paul Newman); an ex-football player, who spends his time drinking and avoiding the ministries of his libidinous wife, Maggie (Dame Elizabeth Taylor) - "the cat". As this gathering isn't so much as a gathering but a farewell (Big Daddy is terminally ill) a lot of memories and revelations which had been hidden come to the surface of both father and son.

movies.title: Red Billabong
movies.summary: In the Australian Outback, two brothers discover old secrets and family lies. As their friends start to go missing they fear they are being stalked by someone or something from their worst nightmares - But is it just - A story? A legend? A hoax? Or is it real?
movies.description_full: In the Australian Outback, two brothers discover old secrets and family lies. As their friends start to go missing they fear they are being stalked by someone or something from their worst nightmares - But is it just - A story? A legend? A hoax? Or is it real?

movies.title: Shanghai Grand
movies.summary: Love for the same woman threatens the friendship of two 1930s Shanghai gangsters.
movies.description_full: Love for the same woman threatens the friendship of two 1930s Shanghai gangsters.
movies.synopsis: Love for the same woman threatens the friendship of two 1930s Shanghai gangsters.

movies.title: Saved by Grace
movies.summary: A retired police officer, despondent over the loss of his family, contemplates a dramatic decision which will change his life forever, until he meets a mysterious woman who, through her personal stories, gives him a reason to re-examine what is most important to him.
movies.description_full: A retired police officer, despondent over the loss of his family, contemplates a dramatic decision which will change his life forever, until he meets a mysterious woman who, through her personal stories, gives him a reason to re-examine what is most important to him.
movies.synopsis: A retired police officer, despondent over the loss of his family, contemplates a dramatic decision which will change his life forever, until he meets a mysterious woman who, through her personal stories, gives him a reason to re-examine what is most important to him.

movies.title: The Last Great Climb
movies.summary: THE LAST GREAT CLIMB from Alastair Lee, is an epic to end all mountain epics, set in the stunning mountains of Queen Maud Land, Antarctica. The 2013 documentary film follows top adventure climber Leo Houlding with his tried and tested team of Jason Pickles and Sean 'Stanley' Leary as they attempted to make the first ascent of the NE ridge of 'the master piece of the range' - the majestic 'Ulvetanna Peak' (2931m), Queen Maud Land, Antarctica. One of the most technically demanding climbs in the world's harshest environment.

One of the most technically demanding climbs in the world's harshest environment.
